nodes.text: The Republic crystal refinery was established by the Galactic Republic on the Eastern Ice Shelf of the planet Ilum to process the Adegan crystal. During the time of the Battle of Ilum in the Galactic War it was raided by the forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire.
The Republic crystal refinery appears as an area on Ilum in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
